registration.SUBJECT: Verify your email for Blue Notary
registration.MESSAGE:
Welcome to Blue Notary!

To verify your email, please click in this link:

%s/verify?verification=%s

forgotPassword.SUBJECT: Password recovery for APP
forgotPassword.MESSAGE:
To recover the password for %s

click the following link:

%s/auth/reset-password/%s

If this was a mistake, please ignore this message.
